Emacspeak 3.46 Release Notes

There are significant improvements to emacspeak since the last release, summarized below. 1) Improved support for the eterm package (eterm allows you to open a terminal inside emacs) 2) Improved vm support. 3) Introduced support for the info reader. 4) Introduced support for auctex. 5) Improved gnus support (Note: introducing support means that these packages are more fun to use with emacspeak) 6) Introduced a module for producing auditory icons. If you have a sound card, emacspeak will give you auditory feedback for significant events using "sound cues" in addition to the spoken feedback. --Raman
raman@adobe.com
